exercises.title: Exercises Library
exercises.subtitle: Discover all the exercises used in calisthenics competitions with their scoring values.
exercises.noExercises: No exercises found for the selected category.

landing.title: Athleon – Where Calisthenics Champions Are Forged
landing.subtitle: Everything you need to run competitions, track excellence, and shape the future of athletes.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything You Need to Run Competitions

multiCompetition.title: Multi-Competition Management
multiCompetition.description: Host unlimited competitions with independent leaderboards, categories, and events. Perfect for gyms, federations, and organizations that want scale without complexity.

realTimeScoring.title: Real-Time Scoring
realTimeScoring.description: Enter scores instantly and watch leaderboards update live. Athletes, coaches, and spectators stay engaged every second of the competition.

athleteManagement.title: Athlete Management
athleteManagement.description: Streamlined registration, smart category assignments, and complete athlete profiles. Athletes own their journey, organizers save time.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Unlock insights with performance trends, athlete comparisons, and detailed competition reports. Turn raw data into actionable knowledge.

multipleWods.title: Multiple WODs per Event
multipleWods.description: Design complex formats with multiple workouts and scoring systems—from simple challenges to CrossFit Games-style competitions.

roleBasedAccess.title: Role-Based Access
roleBasedAccess.description: Super admins, organizers, judges, and athletes each get the right level of access. Secure, organized, and built for collaboration.

step1.title: Create Your Competition
step1.description: Set up your event with dates, categories, and workouts in minutes.

step2.title: Athletes Register
step2.description: Athletes sign up and select their categories through self-service registration.

step3.title: Score & Track
step3.description: Enter scores as events happen and watch the leaderboard update live.

step4.title: Celebrate Winners
step4.description: Final standings, performance analytics, and shareable results.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Calisthenics?
cta.subtitle: Athleon is more than a competition platform—it's the ecosystem where calisthenics athletes are discovered, challenged, and transformed into champions.
